explains: adj. 自身免疫的；自体免疫的
wordGroup: autoimmune disease 自身免疫病；自体免疫疾病

sentences.en: It also protects us from viruses and from autoimmune diseases.
sentences.cn: 它还能保护我们免受病毒和自身免疫性疾病的侵害。

sentences.en: Watch for proteinuria, bone marrow suppression and autoimmune disease with trientine.
sentences.cn: 用曲安汀观察蛋白尿，骨髓抑制和自身免疫性疾病。

sentences.en: Myasthenia gravis(MG) is an autoimmune disease which choline receptor antibody mediates, cell immunity depends on and addiment participates.
sentences.cn: 重症肌无力是乙酰胆碱受体抗体介导、细胞免疫依赖、补体参与的自身免疫性疾病。
